title: An electrifying organ performance
description: Organ virtuoso Qi Zhang plays her electric rendering of "Ridiculous Fellows" from Prokofiev's "The Love for Three Oranges" orchestral suite. This exhilarating performance features the Yamaha Electone Stagea, a rare instrument specially programmed by Qi herself.
author: Qi Zhang
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, music, performance, piano, technology, live music
